short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,da,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,e: An easy-to-use font inspector to get CSS styles of the selected element
short.cs: Lehce použitelný inspektor fontu pro zjištění CSS stylů vybraných prvků
short.de: Ein einfach zu bedienender Schriftartinspektor, um CSS-Stile des ausgewählten Elements zu erhalten
short.el: UΈνας εύχρηστος επιθεωρητής γραμματοσειρών για να λάβετε τα στυλ CSS του επιλεγμένου στοιχείου
short.es: Un inspector de fuentes fácil de usar que permite obtener los estilos CSS del elemento seleccionado
short.fr: Un inspecteur de police facile à utiliser pour obtenir les styles CSS de l'élément sélectionné
short.it: Un ispettore di caratteri facile da usare per ottenere gli stili CSS dell'elemento selezionato
short.ja: 選択した要素のCSSスタイルを取得するための使いやすいフォントインスペクター
short.ko: 선택한 요소의 CSS 스타일을 확인하는 간편한 폰트 검사기
short.nl: Een eenvoudig te gebruiken font inspector om CSS stijlen van het geselecteerde element op te vragen
short.pt_PT: Um inspector de fontes fácil de usar para obter os estilos CSS do elemento seleccionado
short.ru: Простой в использовании инспектор шрифтов для получения стилей CSS выбранного элемента
short.sv: En lättanvänd teckensnittsinspektör för att hämta CSS-stilar för valda element
short.tr: Seçili öğenin CSS stillerini almak için kullanımı kolay bir yazı tipi denetleyicisi
short.zh_CN: 一个易于使用的字体检查器，以获得选定元素的CSS样式。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
FontFinder is created for designers, developers, and typographers. It allows a user to analyze the font information of any element and copy any pieces of that information to the clipboard. Font Finder examines all the selected characters to detect the font used to display this particular character.

FontFinder has three critical pieces of functionality:

  1. Analyze any font on the active page.
  2. Copy any piece of the element's information to the clipboard
  3. Any active element can have any piece of the font's options (such as color, size, or family) adjusted inline

Access these options by right-clicking the context menu over the selected text or right-clicking on the page and inspecting the element.

Information Captured:
  1. Font color (RGB and HEX)
  2. Background color (RGB and HEX)
  3. Font family (including actually rendered font!)
  4. Font size
  5. Line height, vertical alignment, letter, and word spacing
  6. Font weight, style, variant
  7. Text transform, decoration, align and indent
  8. Element's type, class, and ID
  9. Displays remote and local tags next to the rendered font

Tools:
Replace or change font family.
Use custom fonts.
Get the list of all fonts in the current frame.

Notes:
You can change the window opening mode to embedded mode from the right-click items over the toolbar button. This mode helps use the extension in full-screen mode.
long.de:
FontFinder wurde für Designer, Entwickler und Typografen entwickelt. Es ermöglicht einem Benutzer, die Schriftartinformationen eines beliebigen Elements zu analysieren und alle Teile dieser Informationen in die Zwischenablage zu kopieren. Font Finder untersucht alle ausgewählten Zeichen, um die Schriftart zu erkennen, die zur Anzeige dieses bestimmten Zeichens verwendet wird.

FontFinder hat drei wichtige Funktionen:
   1. Analysieren Sie eine beliebige Schriftart auf der aktiven Seite.
   2. Kopieren Sie alle Informationen des Elements in die Zwischenablage
   3. Für jedes aktive Element können alle Schriftoptionen (wie Farbe, Größe oder Familie) inline angepasst werden

--

FontFinder is created for designers, developers, and typographers. It allows a user to analyze the font information of any element and copy any pieces of that information to the clipboard. Font Finder examines all the selected characters to detect the font used to display this particular character.

FontFinder has three critical pieces of functionality:
  1. Analyze any font on the active page.
  2. Copy any piece of the element's information to the clipboard
  3. Any active element can have any piece of the font's options (such as color, size, or family) adjusted inline
long.el:
Το FontFinder έχει δημιουργηθεί για σχεδιαστές, προγραμματιστές και τυπογράφους. Επιτρέπει στον χρήστη να αναλύσει τις πληροφορίες γραμματοσειράς οποιουδήποτε στοιχείου και να αντιγράψει τυχόν κομμάτια αυτών των πληροφοριών στο πρόχειρο. Το Font Finder εξετάζει όλους τους επιλεγμένους χαρακτήρες για να εντοπίσει τη γραμματοσειρά που χρησιμοποιείται για την εμφάνιση αυτού του συγκεκριμένου χαρακτήρα.

Το FontFinder έχει τρία κρίσιμα κομμάτια λειτουργικότητας:
   1. Αναλύστε οποιαδήποτε γραμματοσειρά στην ενεργή σελίδα.
   2. Αντιγράψτε οποιοδήποτε τμήμα των πληροφοριών του στοιχείου στο πρόχειρο
   3. Οποιοδήποτε ενεργό στοιχείο μπορεί να έχει οποιοδήποτε κομμάτι από τις επιλογές της γραμματοσειράς (όπως χρώμα, μέγεθος ή οικογένεια) προσαρμοσμένο ενσωματωμένο

--

FontFinder is created for designers, developers, and typographers. It allows a user to analyze the font information of any element and copy any pieces of that information to the clipboard. Font Finder examines all the selected characters to detect the font used to display this particular character.

FontFinder has three critical pieces of functionality:
  1. Analyze any font on the active page.
  2. Copy any piece of the element's information to the clipboard
  3. Any active element can have any piece of the font's options (such as color, size, or family) adjusted inline
long.es:
FontFinder está creado para diseñadores, desarrolladores y tipógrafos. Le permite a un usuario analizar la información de la fuente de cualquier elemento y copiar cualquier parte de esa información al portapapeles. Font Finder examina todos los caracteres seleccionados para detectar la fuente utilizada para mostrar este carácter en particular.

FontFinder tiene tres piezas críticas de funcionalidad:
   1. Analice cualquier fuente en la página activa.
   2. Copie cualquier parte de la información del elemento al portapapeles
   3. Cualquier elemento activo puede tener cualquier parte de las opciones de la fuente (como color, tamaño o familia) ajustada en línea

--

FontFinder is created for designers, developers, and typographers. It allows a user to analyze the font information of any element and copy any pieces of that information to the clipboard. Font Finder examines all the selected characters to detect the font used to display this particular character.

FontFinder has three critical pieces of functionality:
  1. Analyze any font on the active page.
  2. Copy any piece of the element's information to the clipboard
  3. Any active element can have any piece of the font's options (such as color, size, or family) adjusted inline
long.fr:
FontFinder est créé pour les concepteurs, les développeurs et les typographes. Il permet à un utilisateur d'analyser les informations de police de n'importe quel élément et de copier tous les éléments de ces informations dans le presse-papiers. Font Finder examine tous les caractères sélectionnés pour détecter la police utilisée pour afficher ce caractère particulier.

FontFinder possède trois fonctionnalités essentielles :
   1. Analysez n'importe quelle police sur la page active.
   2. Copiez n'importe quelle information de l'élément dans le presse-papiers
   3. Tout élément actif peut avoir n'importe quelle option de la police (telle que la couleur, la taille ou la famille) ajustée en ligne

--

FontFinder is created for designers, developers, and typographers. It allows a user to analyze the font information of any element and copy any pieces of that information to the clipboard. Font Finder examines all the selected characters to detect the font used to display this particular character.

FontFinder has three critical pieces of functionality:
  1. Analyze any font on the active page.
  2. Copy any piece of the element's information to the clipboard
  3. Any active element can have any piece of the font's options (such as color, size, or family) adjusted inline
long.it:
FontFinder è stato creato per designer, sviluppatori e tipografi. Consente a un utente di analizzare le informazioni sui caratteri di qualsiasi elemento e copiare qualsiasi parte di tali informazioni negli appunti. Font Finder esamina tutti i caratteri selezionati per rilevare il carattere utilizzato per visualizzare questo particolare carattere.

FontFinder ha tre funzionalità critiche:
   1. Analizza qualsiasi carattere nella pagina attiva.
   2. Copia qualsiasi parte delle informazioni dell'elemento negli appunti
   3. Qualsiasi elemento attivo può avere qualsiasi parte delle opzioni del carattere (come colore, dimensione o famiglia) regolate in linea

--

FontFinder is created for designers, developers, and typographers. It allows a user to analyze the font information of any element and copy any pieces of that information to the clipboard. Font Finder examines all the selected characters to detect the font used to display this particular character.

FontFinder has three critical pieces of functionality:
  1. Analyze any font on the active page.
  2. Copy any piece of the element's information to the clipboard
  3. Any active element can have any piece of the font's options (such as color, size, or family) adjusted inline
long.ja:
FontFinderは、デザイナー、開発者、およびタイポグラファー向けに作成されています。 これにより、ユーザーは任意の要素のフォント情報を分析し、その情報の任意の部分をクリップボードにコピーできます。 Font Finderは、選択されたすべての文字を調べて、この特定の文字の表示に使用されるフォントを検出します。

FontFinderには、次の3つの重要な機能があります。
   1.アクティブなページのフォントを分析します。
   2.要素の情報の一部をクリップボードにコピーします
   3.アクティブな要素は、フォントのオプション（色、サイズ、ファミリなど）の任意の部分をインラインで調整できます。

FontFinder is created for designers, developers, and typographers. It allows a user to analyze the font information of any element and copy any pieces of that information to the clipboard. Font Finder examines all the selected characters to detect the font used to display this particular character.

FontFinder has three critical pieces of functionality:
  1. Analyze any font on the active page.
  2. Copy any piece of the element's information to the clipboard
  3. Any active element can have any piece of the font's options (such as color, size, or family) adjusted inline
long.nl:
FontFinder is gemaakt voor ontwerpers, ontwikkelaars en typografen. Hiermee kan een gebruiker de lettertype-informatie van elk element analyseren en delen van die informatie naar het klembord kopiëren. Font Finder onderzoekt alle geselecteerde tekens om het lettertype te detecteren dat wordt gebruikt om dit specifieke teken weer te geven.

FontFinder heeft drie essentiële functionaliteiten:
   1. Analyseer elk lettertype op de actieve pagina.
   2. Kopieer een deel van de informatie van het element naar het klembord
   3. Elk actief element kan elk deel van de lettertype-opties (zoals kleur, grootte of familie) inline hebben aangepast

FontFinder is created for designers, developers, and typographers. It allows a user to analyze the font information of any element and copy any pieces of that information to the clipboard. Font Finder examines all the selected characters to detect the font used to display this particular character.

FontFinder has three critical pieces of functionality:
  1. Analyze any font on the active page.
  2. Copy any piece of the element's information to the clipboard
  3. Any active element can have any piece of the font's options (such as color, size, or family) adjusted inline
long.pt_PT:
FontFinder é criado para designers, desenvolvedores e tipógrafos. Ele permite que um usuário analise as informações de fonte de qualquer elemento e copie quaisquer partes dessas informações para a área de transferência. Font Finder examina todos os caracteres selecionados para detectar a fonte usada para exibir esse caractere específico.

FontFinder tem três peças críticas de funcionalidade:
   1. Analise qualquer fonte na página ativa.
   2. Copie qualquer informação do elemento para a área de transferência
   3. Qualquer elemento ativo pode ter qualquer parte das opções da fonte (como cor, tamanho ou família) ajustadas inline

--

FontFinder is created for designers, developers, and typographers. It allows a user to analyze the font information of any element and copy any pieces of that information to the clipboard. Font Finder examines all the selected characters to detect the font used to display this particular character.

FontFinder has three critical pieces of functionality:
  1. Analyze any font on the active page.
  2. Copy any piece of the element's information to the clipboard
  3. Any active element can have any piece of the font's options (such as color, size, or family) adjusted inline
long.ru:
FontFinder создан для дизайнеров, разработчиков и типографов. Это позволяет пользователю анализировать информацию о шрифте любого элемента и копировать любые фрагменты этой информации в буфер обмена. Средство поиска шрифтов проверяет все выбранные символы, чтобы определить шрифт, используемый для отображения этого конкретного символа.

FontFinder имеет три критически важные функции:
   1. Проанализируйте любой шрифт на активной странице.
   2. Скопируйте любую часть информации об элементе в буфер обмена.
   3. Любой активный элемент может иметь встроенную настройку любой части параметров шрифта (например, цвет, размер или семейство).

--

FontFinder is created for designers, developers, and typographers. It allows a user to analyze the font information of any element and copy any pieces of that information to the clipboard. Font Finder examines all the selected characters to detect the font used to display this particular character.

FontFinder has three critical pieces of functionality:
  1. Analyze any font on the active page.
  2. Copy any piece of the element's information to the clipboard
  3. Any active element can have any piece of the font's options (such as color, size, or family) adjusted inline
long.sv:
FontFinder är skapad för designers, utvecklare och typografer. Det låter en användare analysera teckensnittsinformationen för alla element och kopiera alla delar av den informationen till urklipp. Font Finder undersöker alla valda tecken för att upptäcka teckensnittet som används för att visa just detta tecken.

FontFinder har tre viktiga delar av funktionalitet:
   1. Analysera alla teckensnitt på den aktiva sidan.
   2. Kopiera valfri del av elementets information till urklipp
   3. Alla aktiva element kan ha vilken del av teckensnittets alternativ (som färg, storlek eller familj) justerade inline

--

FontFinder is created for designers, developers, and typographers. It allows a user to analyze the font information of any element and copy any pieces of that information to the clipboard. Font Finder examines all the selected characters to detect the font used to display this particular character.

FontFinder has three critical pieces of functionality:
  1. Analyze any font on the active page.
  2. Copy any piece of the element's information to the clipboard
  3. Any active element can have any piece of the font's options (such as color, size, or family) adjusted inline
long.tr:
FontFinder tasarımcılar, geliştiriciler ve tipograflar için oluşturulmuştur. Bir kullanıcının herhangi bir öğenin yazı tipi bilgilerini analiz etmesine ve bu bilgilerin herhangi bir parçasını panoya kopyalamasına olanak tanır. Yazı Tipi Bulucu, bu belirli karakteri görüntülemek için kullanılan yazı tipini tespit etmek için seçilen tüm karakterleri inceler.

FontFinder üç kritik işlevselliğe sahiptir:
   1. Aktif sayfadaki herhangi bir yazı tipini analiz edin.
   2. Öğe bilgilerinin herhangi bir parçasını panoya kopyalayın
   3. Herhangi bir aktif öğe, yazı tipi seçeneklerinin herhangi bir parçasına (renk, boyut veya aile gibi) satır içi olarak ayarlanmış olabilir.

--

FontFinder is created for designers, developers, and typographers. It allows a user to analyze the font information of any element and copy any pieces of that information to the clipboard. Font Finder examines all the selected characters to detect the font used to display this particular character.

FontFinder has three critical pieces of functionality:
  1. Analyze any font on the active page.
  2. Copy any piece of the element's information to the clipboard
  3. Any active element can have any piece of the font's options (such as color, size, or family) adjusted inline
long.zh_CN:
FontFinder 是为设计师、开发人员和排版师创建的。 它允许用户分析任何元素的字体信息并将该信息的任何部分复制到剪贴板。 字体查找器检查所有选定的字符以检测用于显示此特定字符的字体。

FontFinder 具有三个关键功能：
   1.分析活动页面上的任何字体。
   2.将元素的任何信息复制到剪贴板
   3. 任何活动元素都可以内联调整任何字体选项（例如颜色、大小或系列）

--

  1. Analyze any font on the active page.
  2. Copy any piece of the element's information to the clipboard
  3. Any active element can have any piece of the font's options (such as color, size, or family) adjusted inline
